tspan.tspan: The module is made up of
A simple utility module to scale, shift, and invert signals. Many of the Free Modular modules
create or expect CV signals in the 0-5V range, but many traditional analog Eurorack modules
work in the ±10V range. An offset/attenuverter is ideal for mapping between these voltage
ranges, or any other time modules opperate on different voltage ranges.
